articles.title: Evidence Grows That GPT-5 Is a Bit of a Dud

articles.summary: ChatGPT users are disappointed with the GPT-5 AI chatbot. They accuse OpenAI of making the chatbot warmer and friendlier after feedback that it felt too formal before. OpenAI's previous chatbot ChatGPT was convivial and sycophantic.

articles.title: Claude AI will end ‘persistently harmful or abusive user interactions'

articles.summary: Anthropic's Claude AI chatbot can now end conversations deemed harmful or abusive. The capability is available in Opus 4 and 4.1 models and will allow the chatbot to end conversations as a 'last resort' if users repeatedly ask it to generate harmful content.
